name: Grans with Guns
description:
Grans with Guns is a fun 4-player multiplayer shooter inspired by Hotline Miami with cartoon graphics and lots of action!

Credits:
Aversa Roberta, Bernatti Vittorio Maria, Coco Christian, Coppolecchia Massimo, De Marco Lorenzo, Facente Federico, Falco Luca, Farinelli Fabio, Folino Andrea, Gagliardi Carlo, Giacometto Marco, Gorini Simona, Nigro Maurizio, Omaggio Gabriele, Racca Lorenzo, Savkov Andriy, Segreto Simone
